verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: claimed] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: that he did not fire FBI Director James Comey because of the agency 's investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election] .
Trump claimed Thursday that he [V: did] not fire FBI Director James Comey because of the agency 's investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election .

Trump claimed Thursday that [ARG0: he] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: fire] [ARG1: FBI Director James Comey] [ARGM-CAU: because of the agency 's investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election] .
